item.title: Inside the C++ Object Model
item.description: This article is the collection of concept I have acquired while introducing myself to C++ by googling here & there. This material is also not in order. I have just collected the answer to my quick question. And write it down here. But one thing I can assure you is that once you go through this article. You can connect many broken thought of understanding on what runs “Inside the C++ object model”.
